page.title: 06BIRD SURVEY
page.content: We went out and stood on the school field and counted how many birds we saw in ten minutes. BLACKBIRD 9 HOUSE MARTIN 5 SPARROW 5 WOOD PIGEONS 2 SWALLOWS 18 SWIFTS 2 JACKDAWS 3 PIED WAGTAIL 1 PHEASANT 1 SKYLARK 1 CROWS 18 THRUSH 1 TOTAL OF 66 BIRDS. We did another survey of how many birds nests there were in the school grounds. There are 11 nests. BLACKBIRD 1 PIGEON 1 THRUSH 1 HOUSE MARTIN 2 LINNET 4 BLUE TIT 2. One of the blue tits was in a nest box. There were also a lot of nests outside the school grounds. The four linnets nests were just outside the main school doors but one of the nests had cold eggs in it because the birds must have been frightened and left the nest.
